article: Get Your Cash App Balance on a Phone: Call, Chat, & More
intro: The simplest way to check your Cash App balance is to open the mobile app on your Android or iPhone. But what if you don't have the Cash App installed? Don't worry, you can still check your balance! This wikiHow article will show you 6 easy ways to get your Cash App balance and other support from Cash App when you're not near a computer, from accessing Cash App on the web to calling Cash App support.

steps.title: Call (800) 969-1940 to reach Cash App by phone.Monday through Friday, from 9 AM to 7 PM EST
steps.subtitle: If you're having trouble signing in to your Cash App account to check your balance, you can  for help. A support representative will be able to help you check your balance as well as regain access to your account during normal support hours, which are .
sub-points: Unlike the ease of calling your bank to get your checking account balance, calling Cash App support is  the best or most efficient way to check your balance. You should really try to  or  before calling.

steps.title: Tap the bank icon.
steps.subtitle: You'll see it at the bottom-left corner. This displays your Cash App balance at the top of the screen.
sub-points: If you have a , you can use it to spend your balance anywhere Visa is accepted.
If you use Cash App to , you'll also see your Bitcoin balance.

steps.title: Send a message.
steps.subtitle: Now you can ask questions about your balance, account, , and other concerns.
sub-points: Cash App does not state their chat support hours on their website, but it's likely that the hours closely mirror their , which are 5 AM to 7 PM PT.
When the support representative replies to you, you'll receive a  in the app.

steps.title: Send a Twitter direct message to @CashSupport.
steps.subtitle: If you , you can  to Cash App's support team for a quick response. While the support team may not instantly provide you with your Cash App balance on Twitter without confirming your identity over the phone first, they'll be very helpful at getting you back into your account so you can easily check your balance in the mobile app or on the web. Don't include any private or identifying information in a public tweet.
sub-points: You can go directly to  in your web browser or search for  in the Twitter mobile app.
Cash App's support team is available on Twitter every day between 5 AM and 7 PM PT.

steps.title: While Cash App is active on many social media platforms, they don't offer support on any other than Twitter and Reddit.
steps.subtitle: If you're having trouble accessing your Cash App balance and have not been able to get help on any other platform, the Reddit user CashAppAndi is a Cash App support agent whose primary focus is to help users on Reddit fix problems in the app.
sub-points: If you're new to Reddit, you can sign up at  or by downloading the Reddit app from the App Store (iPhone/iPad) or Play Store (Android).
It's usually a good idea to  in the subreddit  before writing to CashAppAndi directly. Just make sure not to include any private or identifying information in your post, as it will be totally public.
To send a private message to CashAppAndi in the Reddit app, search for /u/CashAppAndi, tap , and then tap .
